reviews.title: Stylish and Good Value Hotel - October 2003
reviews.text: Great location to all amenities, although whole road and pavements being repaved, will give whole area facelift-but noisy for us! Rooms spacious and black and white stylish theme. Hotel staff friendly and helpful - International Boat Fayre was held on our weekend so very busy. Restaurant in Hotel not open for evening meals at weekend - Hotel recommended excellent restaurant close by called Lupos- a must for fish food gormets. Train station 2 mins across square great to take trip to Nervi (beautiful - and sometimes rugged - coastal area) along riviera and surrounding area. Lastly take a trip in the funiculor to top of Genoa from Santa Anna (5 min walk away) to top breathtaking views and only 1 euro return within 2 hours. Great value hotel in a beautiful city - airport only 10 mins drive away by taxi.

reviews.title: Convenient hotel near the station
reviews.text: The hotel was very convenient for the station, less than 2 minutes walk. The area around the hotel felt a bit seedy in my opinion. The room was of a good size and had a kitchenette area with a sink and hot plate but nothing to cook with! The bed was comfortable and the bathroom (with shower) was fine and of a reasonable size. There is a restaurant and bar downstairs and the breakfast in the morning was good with a wide range of hot and cold items. The hotel was being renovated when we visited (September 2003) probably before the city of culture.
